name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 100 - GOLD EDITION
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, And Hold On For Dear Life - GOLD EDITION, a special piece only available to collectors who collected at least 5 of the first 99 pieces, HODL I’m in this for the long run!
